channel.title: What is your best forum post?
channel.description:
As opposed to the "Best/Worst Forum Quotes" page, which is largely humorous, I've been thinking a bit recently about the posts I am most proud of here on the ToL forums. Although the majority of my posting here has been in one FM/FoL game or another, I think the two posts I am personally most proud of are two larger write-ups I have done on the state of Throne of Lies itself. I've usually had a decent sense for balance, but I am particularly happy with the points I made in these two posts, and very pleased with how they are structured.
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/please-do-not-add-a-ranked-mode/33151/2?u=orangeandblack5
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/i-blame-alchemist/71649?u=orangeandblack5
I'm sure some of you must have posts of your own that you are proud of making. Although neither of mine are from a forum game, feel free to include one of those if you had a killer reads-list, or an amazing plan, or you made a joke so good you think about it to this day. I am genuinely curious what all of you guys feel your personal best posts are. If you'd let me know which of your posts you really like, and why, I think this could end up being a really cool and interesting thread.

item.title: What is your best forum post?
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
The first post of the cookie thread

Read full topic

Also, warning for Meme: Those comments were uncalled for and rude, please refrain from making them.

item.title: What is your best forum post?
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Fine serious. My proudest moment was when I won the first Behind The Masks because I had no idea what was going on and there were loads of people from other sites who had played before. It was pretty much just a mixture of luck and not being targeted because I acted dumb but I was still super proud.

(not a quote but hey)

Read full topic
item.source: What is your best forum post?
